title: Rio – Rainbow Gate!
alternative_title: Rio - Rainbow Gate!: Reshuffle, リオ レインボーゲート!
description: Mint Clark arrives at Howard Resort with her multimillionaire grandfather. Tired of amusement parks and beaches, Mint spots the beautiful dealer Rio, also known as the “Goddess of Victory.” While Mint is captivated by her smile, a man named Orlin Dunhill appears before them and attempts to steal Mint’s precious stuffed bear. Rio must play poker to save Mint.
